recipesJson.name: Stunner
recipesJson.author: Philosaphucker
recipesJson.description: This one pairs two flavors that really like to show off in order to create a bright, sweet, tropical vape. The strawberry and watermelon balance and sweeten these floral fruits.

reviews.text: Vaping this right now after an overnight steep and I'm really loving it. Lightly sweet and flavorful with a beautiful, tropical/citric twang. This is just the thing I needed to take the chill off this cold, 33 degree day! Will definitely mix again, not only to keep the winter blues away, but to celebrate summer if it ever comes back to New England. ;-)
